sys_metadata_link.payload: .fd-ex-checkbox input { display: none; } .fd-ex-checkbox label { padding-left: 35px; position: relative; line-height: 30px; cursor: pointer; font-size: 15px; } .fd-ex-checkbox label span { display: inline-block; border: 3px solid #C4D0D6; border-radius: 8px; background-color: #F9FDFF; width: 28px; height: 28px; position: absolute; left: 0; top: 0; } .fd-ex-checkbox input:checked + label > span { background-color: #305497; } .df_fdExampleCheckboxField .fd-ex-checkbox input { display: none; } .df_fdExampleCheckboxField .fd-ex-checkbox label { padding-left: 35px; position: relative; line-height: 30px; cursor: pointer; font-size: 15px; } .df_fdExampleCheckboxField .fd-ex-checkbox label span { display: inline-block; border: 3px solid #C4D0D6; border-radius: 8px; background-color: #F9FDFF; width: 28px; height: 28px; position: absolute; left: 0; top: 0; } .df_fdExampleCheckboxField .fd-ex-checkbox input:checked + label > span { background-color: #305497; } fdExampleCheckboxField fd_example_checkbox_field fd-example-checkbox-field admin 2017-08-30 07:12:35 9a178b834ff08300ab4450af0310c729 12 dylan.lindgren@snc 2017-09-06 01:29:39 #ffffff true image/png screenshot 40 178 2570 2482 admin 2017-08-30 07:18:37 e2780bc34ff08300ab4450af0310c791 2 admin 2017-08-30 07:18:37 ZZ_YYx_snc_formdec_directive 9a178b834ff08300ab4450af0310c729 H4sIAAAAAAAAAA== 16 0 e2780bc34ff08300ab4450af0310c791 admin 2017-08-30 07:18:37 26780bc34ff08300ab4450af0310c791  3296 1 e2780bc34ff08300ab4450af0310c791 admin 2017-08-30 07:18:37 a6780bc34ff08300ab4450af0310c791
